item.title: Real-Time Alerts That Reach the People Who Can Act
item.description:
Safety isnâ€™t just about reporting â€” itâ€™s about responding.
AISee sends instant alerts with images to the actual operating staff via WhatsApp or the mobile app.
If someone misses a helmet or enters a restricted zone, supervisors know immediately â€” with a visual alert they can act on.

This closes the gap between observation and action.
No waiting for reports. No missed incidents.

item.title: Turning Safety into Measurable Metrics with AISee
item.description:
For years, safety audits have relied on manual observations and checklists â€” difficult to sustain and nearly impossible to measure objectively.
With AISee, shop floors now gain measurable, daily metrics for safety adherence using their existing CCTV feeds.

AISeeâ€™s Vision-AI technology automatically detects safety gear like helmets, jackets, and goggles, logs compliance by shift, and builds visual trend reports.
Supervisors and managers can see at a glance how safety compliance evolves over time â€” by workstation, by shift, and by department.

item.title: How a Tier 1 Supplier Cut Inspection Time by 95% Using VISPECT
item.description:
A Tier 1 Supplier’s Journey from 15-Minute Inspections to 45 Seconds

In the world of commercial vehicle manufacturing, quality assurance is non-negotiable. For one Tier 1 supplier specializing in fabrication and metal forming, ensuring precision across thousands of parts per month was a serious operational challenge.

Before VISPECT, their most complex partâ€”requiring five different views and 150 individual part identification checksâ€”took around 15 minutes to inspect manually. This created delays, fatigue, and inconsistencies across operators and shifts. Also, this was with an experienced operator, who could only inspect a limited number of parts per hour.

item.title: The AI Solution to Quality Control Crisis in Manufacturing SMEs
item.description:
The Future of Visual Inspection is Here

Imagine this: a new operator walks onto your factory floor and begins performing complex visual inspections with the precision of a seasoned quality engineer. This isnâ€™t science fictionâ€”itâ€™s real, thanks to AI-powered visual inspection.

At AICUE Data Lab, we created VISPECT to address one of the most persistent challenges in manufacturing: maintaining consistent, high-quality inspection despite a shortage of skilled labor and increasing product complexity.
